title: @contentlayer/source-notion
excerpt: API reference for working with Notion.

body.raw:
This module provides the methods for working with [Notion](https://notion.so) as your content source. Typical usage involves two primary functions: - [`makeSource`](/docs/reference/source-notion/make-source) controls the entire schema definition for your application. - [`defineDatabase`](/docs/reference/source-notion/define-database) defines how your database should be used to generate your document types. --- ## Reference Guides
These guides will dig into the details of each function to enable you to better understand how to work with local content.
- - -
--- ## Other Notion Source Guides
There are a few other guides to help you learn how to work with Notion.
- - - - -
